stageName: Lesson 1 - The Basics â€” How to Build and Read Your Birth Chart
stageDescription:
Learn the fundamental principles of astrology and how to construct your birth chart. Discover the meaning of planets, houses, and aspects that make up your unique astrological blueprint.

This foundational lesson will give you the tools to understand your personal astrological profile and how it influences your career and financial potential.

stageName: Lesson 2 - Discover Your Most Lucrative Career Paths
stageDescription: Explore how your birth chart reveals your natural talents and the career paths where you can excel and earn the highest income. Learn to identify the planetary combinations that indicate financial success.

stageName: Lesson 3 - How to Land a High-Paying Job
stageDescription: Master the strategies to leverage your astrological profile in job interviews and career negotiations. Learn how to present yourself in a way that aligns with your chart's strengths.

stageName: Lesson 4 - Practical Steps to Activate Wealth Flow
stageDescription: Learn specific techniques to activate the wealth-generating potential in your birth chart. Discover daily practices that align your energy with financial abundance.

stageName: Lesson 5 - Smart Money Management & Growing Your Capital
stageDescription: Master the art of managing and growing your wealth based on your astrological profile. Learn investment strategies that align with your chart's financial indicators.

stageName: Lesson 6 - Pinpointing Quick-Income Opportunities in Your Chart
stageDescription: Identify the specific planetary transits and aspects that indicate quick-income opportunities. Learn to recognize and act on these windows of financial potential.

stageName: Lesson 7 - Creating a Work Environment That Keeps You Energized and Aligned
stageDescription: Design a work environment and lifestyle that supports your astrological needs and prevents burnout. Learn to create sustainable success that aligns with your true nature.
